title: Geri Horner is left VERY awkward over 'savage' Victoria Beckham impression on RuPaul's Drag Race UK
text:
She was one of the celebrity guest judges on the hit BBC show.

And Geri Horner was left feeling very awkward on Thursday's RuPaul's Drag Race UK after Divina de Campo did a 'savage' Victoria Beckham impression.

The episode saw the contestants compete in the show's legendary Snatch Game where Divina decided to play American chef Julia Child after deliberating between playing Victoria Beckham or Margaret Thatcher.

Scroll down for video

Eek: Geri Horner was left feeling very awkward on Thursday's RuPaul's Drag Race UK after Divina de Campo did a 'savage' Victoria Beckham impression

Yet Divina's Julia Child impersonations didn't go down too well with the judges and when she revealed on stage during the feedback segment that she was going to play Posh Spice Victoria, Geri squealed with excitement.

The Spice Girls star, 47, said: 'You were going to do Posh? Posh? You would have been a brilliant Posh!'

To which Divina, who has previously worked with Geri on BBC's All Together Now, joked: 'But after you've pointed and pouted, where the f**k are you going?'

The drag queen was then asked to do an impression of Posh Spice on stage, to which she said in character: 'Well, I'd really like to join you on the reunion, Geri... but I can't be a***d because I'm a brand now.'

Unimpressed: The episode saw the contestants compete in the show's legendary Snatch Game where Divina decided to play American chef Julia Child after deliberating between playing Victoria Beckham (pictured in 2018) or Margaret Thatcher

Impression: Yet Divina's Julia Child impersonations didn't go down too well with the judges and when she revealed on stage during the feedback segment that she was going to play Posh Spice Victoria, Geri squealed with excitement

Divina's impression didn't go down too well with the judging panel - made up of RuPaul, Alan Carr and Michelle Visage, with a confused and awkward-looking Geri saying: 'Oh...'

Reading the room, the drag queen joked: 'Is that a big savage? Sorry!' with a cringing Geri admitting: 'A little bit!'

The Snatch Game sees contestants transform into a chosen celebrity as they partake in a game based on American game show, Match Game, they are tested for the impersonation and improvisation skills.

Oh dear: The drag queen was then asked to do an impression of Posh Spice on stage, to which she said in character: 'Well, I'd really like to join you on the reunion, Geri... but I can't be a***d because I'm a brand now.'

Not ideal: Divina's impression didn't go down too well with the judging panel - made up of RuPaul (pictured), Alan Carr and Michelle Visage, with a confused and awkward-looking Geri saying: 'Oh...'

'Savage': Reading the room, the drag queen joked: 'Is that a big savage? Sorry!' with a cringing Geri (pictured) admitting: 'A little bit!'

Thursday's episode saw Stacey Dooley and Lorraine Kelly sit on the Snatch Game panel with The Vivienne and Baga Chipz winning praise for their impersonations of Donald Trump and Baga Chipz.

Over the summer, the Spice Girls reunited as a four piece for a special tour across the UK and Ireland with the leg of their shows ending at the iconic Wembley Stadium.

The girl band toured without their fifth member Victoria Beckham and appeared to make several cheeky digs at her absence during their tracks.

RuPaul's Drag Race UK continues on Thursdays at 8pm on BBC Three.
description: The episode saw the contestants compete in the show's legendary Snatch Game where Divina decided to play American chef Julia Child after deliberating between playing Victoria Beckham.
